about_the_game:
Are you someone who is a bit tired of endlessly managing resources in a city-building game, but still enjoy seeing your beautiful cities grow? We too!

We would like to present you with a game of relaxing atmosphere, and vibrant warmth of charming landscapes. By the end of the game you will expand your settlements from humble villages to sprawling cities. All this without tedious resource management and unnecessary stress!



There are many playstyles available, from methodically planning your turns; to just following along with the game and placing the buildings wherever the most resources are; to completely ignoring the game rules and releasing your inner creative, building the most picturesque landscape. The choice is yours!



We are a small team and would be thrilled if you gave us a chance. Enjoy your stay and see you in the Land of Honey and Wine!

name: Land of Honey and Wine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Land of Honey and Wine is a relaxing city-building and puzzle game where you build beautiful villages and towns by placing tiles. Explore a variety of colorful maps, unlock new buildings and complete quests to fill your world with life!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
